backend/main.mo: Main actor defining ClientRecord with VMStatus enum, managing client records, notifications, chat messages, global announcements, and network monitoring with CRUD operations and query functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old client records without vmStatus to new records with vmStatus defaulting to #online, and initializes empty chatMessages map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: VM status controls, VM status indicator, chat widget, admin chat panel, and admin profile display with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including authentication hooks, React Query hooks, UI components, pages, and configuration files with Carbon Black/Neon Green theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color system with Carbon Black and Neon Green color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'LuidCorporation Dashboard Ecosystem' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, theme provider, authentication providers, and routes for admin/client login and dashboards with protected route wrappers.
frontend/src/components/AdminChatPanel.t: Admin chat management interface displaying client list with unread counts, message history, and send message functionality with real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/AdminProfileDisp: Component displaying admin username with avatar initials and Shield icon in a styled card using data from useAdminAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/ChatWidget.tsx: A floating chat widget component that allows clients to send and receive messages with admin support, displaying unread message counts and auto-scrolling to new messages.
A modal dialog component for editing existing client records, including fields for name, passwords, VPS credentials, plan, and VM status.
frontend/src/components/ClientList.tsx: Displays a table of all registered clients with actions to edit, delete, send notifications, and update VM status (online/offline/maintenance).
frontend/src/components/ClientProfileMen: A dropdown menu component showing the authenticated client's profile information with avatar initials and a logout option.
frontend/src/components/ClientProtectedR: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated clients to the home page and only renders children for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ClientRegistrati: A form component for registering new clients with fields for ID, name, client password, VPS IP, VPS credentials, and plan information.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying the copyright notice 'LuidCorporationÂ© 2026'.
frontend/src/components/GlobalAnnounceme: Displays a global announcement banner at the top of the page with an animated pulse effect when an announcement is active.
An admin component for creating, updating, and clearing global announcements that are displayed to all clients.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMonitorin: A card component with radio buttons to toggle network monitoring status between 'normal' (2.5-4.8 Gbps) and 'offline' (0 Gbps), using React Query hooks for fetching and updating status.
frontend/src/components/NetworkSpeedChar: Displays a real-time line chart of network speed using Recharts, showing current speed in Gbps and historical data from a simulation hook with region and latency metadata.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: A bell icon button with badge counter that opens a popover displaying global announcements and client-specific notifications, with functionality to clear all notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated admin users to the login page using the admin auth hook and TanStack Router navigation.
frontend/src/components/SendNotification: A dialog modal for admins to send individual notifications to specific clients, featuring a textarea for message input and mutation handling with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/VMStatusIndicato: Displays VM status (online/offline/maintenance) in a card with color-coded indicators and descriptive text based on the VMStatus enum value.
frontend/src/components/VpsCredentialsCa: Shows VPS access credentials including IP address, username, password (with toggle visibility), and plan name in a formatted card layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with React Query caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Provides admin authentication context with hardcoded credentials, supporting login/logout with optional remember-me functionality using localStorage or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAuth.tsx: Provides React context and hooks for client authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting client data to localStorage or sessionStorage based on 'remember me' preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP, providing a React context and hooks to manage identity state, login flow, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkSpeedSimula: Simulates network speed data (2.5-4.8 Gbps) using sine waves and randomness, updating every 2 seconds and respecting monitoring status (returns 0 when offline).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on client records, VM status, notifications, chat messages, global announcements, and network monitoring status using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with a carbon black and neon green color theme, including CSS custom properties for consistent dark mode styling across the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with form for ID/password authentication, remember me checkbox, and navigation to admin panel on successful login using useAdminAuth hook.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Main admin dashboard with tabbed interface for managing clients, chat, announcements, and network monitoring, including logout functionality and admin profile display.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard page displaying VPS credentials, VM status indicator, network speed chart, notifications, and a chat widget. Uses client authentication and fetches client record data.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLogin.tsx: Client login page with ID Luid and password authentication, remember me functionality, and navigation to dashboard upon successful login. Validates credentials against backend actor.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette (carbon-black, neon-green themes), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features (VM status management, chat system, admin profile display) and pending feature requests for the Luid Corporation Dashboard admin panel.
